name: Bubble Shooter: Princess Pop
description:
This is an easy to start, active, high gameplay of the game, once started there is no way to stop.

Bubble Shooter is a fun, classic bubble shooter game that's all about popping balls and solving puzzles! Shoot the bubbles to defeat the challenge and clear the board. Train your brain with this awesome puzzle game as you pop bubbles online, offline - anytime! Bubble Shooter is the best free game available on Store.
 
Play Classic Game Mode - Simple, Fun.
 
Enjoy Arcade Game Mode - Never be bored anymore!
 
Play Puzzle Game Mode and Discover the Amazing Bubble Popping Fun!

We've played classic arcade games and added some new features that you'll surely enjoy:
+++ Thousands of exciting levels, with more, added all the time.
+++ New elements and exciting prizes
+++ New effects and sounds and a cool redesign
+++ Collect great daily rewards
+++ Connect with Facebook and share with friends.
+++ You can increase? Buy more bubble.
+++ Leaderboards, challenging achievements.
+++ Clear the obstacles and beat the challenges
Color blindness mode - so that people can play the fun combination games for free
+++ You can buy more power ups to shoot faster through the screen.
+++ More than 540 screens for your entertainment.
 
Do not miss these crazy bubbles!
Get ready, target and shoot the bubbles!
